1.name: The Wrong End of Time: Part 1
1.title: The Wrong End of Time: Part 1
1.title_es: The Wrong End of Time: Part 1

plot: Simon and Liz were teenage friends who fell into a time hole and found themselves trapped in various periods of the 20th century, where they encounter all sorts of adventures. Many of them involve the nefarious Commander Traynor, who is also traveling in time.

lists.title: las mejores series clásicas de ciencia ficción
